meta.description: API Problem and JSON HAL based API for editing dictionary like XML datasets. Accept application/json can be used for unauthenticated access.
meta.author: Omar Siam

ul.li:
Features
Added a cache for a high number of entries
Implement actually showing a lemma or an alternative lemma as specified in profile
Schema validation using XSD, RelaxNG or Schematron

Features
User management for using well known dictionary finished
GET, POST (create), DELETE of dictionaries finished
GET, PUT (update), POST (create), DELETE of dictionary entries finished
Access control implemented
Locking for editing implemented
